overview.title: Adult Income
overview.excerpt: Predict whether an individual's income exceeds $50K using demographic data with KNN.

details.title: Adult Income
details.longDescription: This project applies K-Nearest Neighbours (KNN) to predict if an adult's income exceeds $50K based on demographic features such as age, education, and occupation. Users can explore model evaluation, feature scaling, and distance metric selection to optimize classification performance.
